attributes.additional_details: Shorter school times are better for children as they can socialise more and be outside mnore being healthy
attributes.background: make Shool times around london shorter

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do: to establish shorter school days, weeks or both. 

You may wish to sign the below petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596
To make Friday one less day of school, to allow kids to reset for monday.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638655
Require all schools to have at least 75 minutes of break time a day

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
